document.full_text: targeted cyber attacks will pose a growing threat to companies around the world this year after the stuxnet worm hit iran's nuclear program in 2010, security software maker symantec corp said on tuesday.
document.title: targeted cyber attacks to rise further: symantec
lines_and_colors: targeted cyber attacks will pose a growing threat to companies around the world this year after the stuxnet worm hit iran's nuclear program in 2010, security software maker symantec corp said on tuesday.
